name: One Last Roll
description:
Join Stanley to play his favourite board game! Press "Spacebar" to roll the die and move your stone, and discover the secrets of his cabin and former life.

This game was made for GMTK 2022 Game Jam, the theme was "Roll the dice"

Special thanks and credits to:

Zapsplat.com - Providing music and sounds for the game

Devtoid - Coin asset

Aleksn09 - Key asset

Armor and Rum - Dice asset
